nodes.text: IoT enables remote management and automation of home appliances, improving efficiency, comfort, safety, and resource use
IoT systems allow remote control and monitoring of devices via sensors and internet connectivity
IoT enabled home automation provides multiple benefits including better monitoring, time efficiency, cost savings, improved quality of life, smart environment control, and health monitoring
Device-to-device transmission and sensor integration reduce the need for user intervention and improve monitoring accuracy
Automation of repetitive tasks through IoT increases operational efficiency and saves users time
Optimal use of energy and resources via IoT monitoring can reduce costs
IoT can create smart environments (for example automated window/shade control, pollution and emission monitoring) and support health monitoring for patients and seniors
IoT applications span multiple sectors including smart cities, industrial automation, commercial use, and healthcare
Key IoT communication technologies and protocols include Bluetooth Low Energy, ZigBee, Z-Wave, Wi-Fi, Cellular (GSM/3G/4G), NFC, and LoRaWAN
These protocols trade off range, power consumption, data rate, infrastructure availability and cost to meet specific IoT application needs
A WiFi-based home automation prototype achieved remote appliance control and monitoring and was reported as scalable and flexible compared to commercial systems (Ahmed ElShafee 2012)
A low-cost expandable IoT home automation implementation successfully controlled simple appliances remotely (Vinay Sagar 2015)
Security and privacy vulnerabilities are a significant limitation that can undermine IoT reliability and adoption
Reviews note that widespread IoT deployment increases security and privacy risks, which must be addressed for reliability (Anurag Tiwari et al. 2017)
This paper is a literature review summarizing IoT concepts, architecture, benefits, applications, technologies, protocols, and prior work on home automation
Conclusion: IoT has broad and growing scope across sectors and IoT home appliances simplify life; combining AI with IoT can further improve comfort and automation
